channel.title: Need Help ASAP
channel.description:
Hi, on my server i've everytime someone tries to logging it says, player is bugged / nulled, or the player gets a black screen and keeps dcing. somebody help me plz.
When i minimize the client and bring it black up, the whole client is black.
[img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/9236/nullproblem.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need Help ASAP
item.dc:creator: @dogs dogs
item.description:
@dogs wrote:

Liquid Magic:

“your server ip here”. Did you try changing that to 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0? That’s what it says in the console, so I’m just assuming. Plus it says it couldn’t transfer the data.

do you think this could be happening, because there’s like 10+ customs added?

because the client without customs works.

Read full topic
